articles.title: Warren slams TurboTax for upselling taxpayers during filing process
articles.description: Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D-Mass.) criticized TurboTax on Monday for charging taxpayers for relatively simple tax returns and repeatedly upselling them during the filing process. Ahead of Monday night’s tax deadline, Warren pointed to an example of a sample taxpayer with a “simple filing situation” who would qualify for the IRS’s new Direct File tool, which…
articles.content:

articles.title: The world should model Italy’s crackdown on surrogacy
articles.description: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni is setting an example for the rest of the world by banning the exploitative and harmful practice of surrogacy.
articles.content:
For all their talk of human rights and equality, very few nations in the developed world have taken a critical view of the inherently exploitative practice of surrogacy. But Italy is one notable exception.
The Mediterranean nation has already banned ... [1999 chars]

articles.title: Scientists Discover 50 New Deep-Sea Species Near Easter Island
articles.description: The discoveries "have unveiled constitute a dramatic example of how little we know," researcher Javier Sellanes said.
articles.content:
Over 50 brand-new species have been discovered lurking on an ocean ridge in the Pacific.
These new species were discovered alongside over 100 other species of crabs, corals, sea urchins, squid, fish, corals, mollusks, sea stars, glass sponges and squ... [5160 chars]

articles.title: Gwen Stefani’s Reunion With No Doubt at Coachella Leaves Fans in Tears
articles.description: “To me, she’s a prime example of an artist who defies stereotypes,” Olivia Rodrigo said about Gwen Stefani.
articles.content: Gwen Stefani and No Doubt made a successful return at Coachella 2024, performing for the first time since 2013. The reunion took place on Saturday night, with Stefani and her former bandmates taking center stage at the outdoor venue in Indio, Califor... [3320 chars]

articles.title: “I Probably Won’t Be in F1”: Charles Leclerc Sets Retirement Plans With Fernando Alonso Example
articles.description: Charles Leclerc reveals his F1 retirement plans by comparing himself with 42-year-old Fernando Alonso and his Aston Martin contract renewal.
articles.content: Fernando Alonso etched his name in the history books of F1 with his Aston Martin contract renewal. At 42 years old, otherwise considered past retirement age, he has signed the “longest contract” in his F1 career. Charles Leclerc, who in his rookie ye... [3208 chars]

articles.title: Zendaya Is So Good at This
articles.description: ‘Challengers’ is the ultimate example to date of what has become a distinctively Zendaya screen energy. Luca Guadagnino’s forthcoming sports drama will be the project that puts her over the top, as both a serious actress and a brand.
articles.content:
Photo: Pari Dukovic for New York Magazine
Denis Villeneuve’s two Dune films are bookended by Zendaya’s face. It’s her voice as the Fremen warrior Chani that you see and hear in the opening flash-forward of the first movie, introducing viewers to the ... [14230 chars]

articles.title: It’s not on women to fix this one.
articles.description: The reaction to Arizona’s abortion ban is just the latest example.

articles.title: Readers sound off on affordable hospitals, Christian Zionists and Biden's campaign strategy
articles.description: Manhattan: Elected officials from across Manhattan celebrated the state Health Department’s rejection of the plan to close Mount Sinai Beth Israel medical center as yet another example of a large health care company failing to address the severe shortage of hospital beds and quality medical care in underserved communities across the city.
